item.description:
Let's have brunch at the Olde Salt restaurant.

The Olde Salt brunch is the best value on the seacoast, for $16 you get to choose selections from 8 stations, There's a bread station, a breakfast station, a lunch station, an omelet station, a carving station, a pastry station, a specialty station and a chocolate fountain.

This is a very popular brunch, it's full until 2PM so I'm going to make reservations.  Due to how busy it gets I'm going to limit this to 10 people.   Please don't sign up and do a no show, or back out the morning of the event, it isn't fair to me or the Olde Salt.
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation made under my last name.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Brunch at the Olde Salt
